item.description: The Dishonesty of the Abortion Debate. https://t.co/Pj6BvYjvf0
‚ÄúThey cannot help as long as the fetus is alive thanks to the anti-abortion law,‚Äù she wrote only hours before she died. ‚ÄúA woman is like an incubator.‚Äù https://t.co/Snd86A3viP
Reconstruction should‚Äôve eliminated the electoral college and the senate, maybe even states. https://t.co/qr6wfSp5V6
Why did Justice Sotomayor go out of her way to humanize Clarence Thomas? https://t.co/8ml9Mf8ek9
Hah no wonder Clarence Thomas isn‚Äôt going after Loving. He‚Äòs in an interracial marriage. What an asshole.
@HopeLoveLaughMA not what i was thinking. someone who inspires the people.

I wonder what the federalists plan to do when the dems add four more justices to the supreme court. didn't hear that idea discussed on msnbc tonight.
also no mention of the ninth amendment tonight on msnbc. in it is proof that the supreme court isn't about the constitution. they're playing their own game.
but the dems are actually right to make it about the election, but instead of telling us to vote, they should be running ads that make the repubs eat this. i hope that's what pelosi was saying.
after the november election biden should announce he's not running again, and let the dems start the campaign for 2024 then. someone young and strong, and not the typical wimpy democrat. someone who breathes fire and kicks republican ass.
i leave you tonight with this ad, which until today was just a cautionary tale but now it is reality in the united states of america. spread it around. this is home.

@SamQuinnCBS There are no Nets fans.

I wish the Dems had prepared for this moment. They had the time. The best they can come up with is "Vote?" Really. We voted Obama into the presidency and he let the Repubs steal a judge from us. What good does voting do if the people we elect won't fight!
When the Dems say vote it's like the power industry saying we (you and I) need to conserve. As if it's our fault that they want to keep killing our environment.
Same with the Dems. I guess it's our fault because we didn't vote, right? Is that why abortion is illegal now?
Right. Fuck you Democrats. We elected you to protect Roe v Wade and to regulate guns. In two days we lose on both, and you have the audacity to BLAME VOTERS!
FUCK YOU. I've had it with Democrats.
Instead of telling us to vote, tell us how you're going to force every Repub running for re-election to explain what they're going to do to restore Roe. They should be asked this question at every stop. When they go out to dinner or show up at the airport going to Cancun.

@ElieNYC I wish you would publish it. Now so people understand what just happened. I bet the Repubs have prepared for this, and have a few choice soundbites ready to go. Should we be reduced to shouting "They're lying!" Gotta get out in front if just a little. You have it.
